data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Papua, Indonesia to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Papua, Indonesia

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Papua unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 31 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 2,833,400 souls living in the state of Papua with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 90,907 believers in Papua against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Spirit, I pray that the Mairiri people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Papua, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Papua with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary:
the state of Papua, Indonesia has a population of 2,833,400.

We estimate Papua has 90,907 people who might know Jesus, 228,387 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,514,106 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 31 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Papua.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
